user_instruction: 'Send an email to Sarah at Bright Futures Foundation (sarah@brightfutures.org) with my insights to help with the "Read to Succeed" project. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Your Insights on “Read to Succeed”

Hi John,

I hope you’re well. As we move into the next planning phase of the “Read to Succeed” literacy program, I’d love to incorporate more of your academic perspective and data-driven feedback. 

Could you please send me an email (sarah@brightfutures.org) summarizing any insights, research notes, or recommendations you think would strengthen our curriculum and outreach plans? If it’s helpful, feel free to pull or reference materials from your Notion workspace—especially anything related to literacy intervention metrics or best-practice case studies.

Whenever you have a moment this week would be wonderful; even a brief outline will help us stay on schedule.

Thank you so much for your ongoing support and expertise.

Warm regards,

Sarah

final_output:
Subject: Request for Your Insights on “Read to Succeed”

Hi John,

I hope you’re well. As we move into the next planning phase of the “Read to Succeed” literacy program, I’d love to incorporate more of your academic perspective and data-driven feedback. 

Could you please send me an email (sarah@brightfutures.org) summarizing any insights, research notes, or recommendations you think would strengthen our curriculum and outreach plans? If it’s helpful, feel free to pull or reference materials from your Notion workspace—especially anything related to literacy intervention metrics or best-practice case studies.

Whenever you have a moment this week would be wonderful; even a brief outline will help us stay on schedule.

Thank you so much for your ongoing support and expertise.

Warm regards,

Sarah
